name: REALY
introduce: Realy is the first Live-to-Earn metaverse on Solana. Developing via Unreal Engine, Realy Metaverse will be a virtual city in the sky with 3A graphics. Realy focuses on street culture by merging real world names including fashion brands, graffiti artists, chic toy brands, rappers and skateboard brands to Metaverse. Realy Metaverse City in the Sky will consist of natures, buildings, streets, arts, stadiums, and so on. Users will be immersed in street cultures and achieve their dreams. The REAL token will act as the base layer of infrastructure serving all levels of crypto activities.
